title: Download Firefox
content: Can I download Firefox onto a memory stick and transfer to another computer?
creator: alex.wendy90

title: Every time I close the window or restart my computer, I am logged out of everything
content: What it says in the above question. I get logged out of all websites, which I have to sign into everything again, which is annoying, and many of the websites act like it's a completely new computer/browser, even if i ask them to save this browser. Had this problem for a few months now, not sure what setting changed to cause this.
creator: KWHEYDEN

title: missing toolbar "file, edit, bookmark, etc"
content: I have 2 computers, both with Linux Ubuntu. All of a sudden one of them is missing the File toolbar. It was there this AM but gone now. I looked through the menu and couldn't find where it is that you add the toolbar. On this computer, which has that toolbar, you go to 'view" and there is an item for toolbar. But on the other there are none of those menus and I can't find where to add that toolbar.
creator: pdsimdars

title: S Mode
content:
Anyone know if the Firefox app will be in the Microsoft Store soon for download?

I bought a new computer and if I download the app from the website I will permanently be taken out of S mode (I’m sure you guys are aware of this issue).

Im hoping the app will be available through the Microsoft Store very soon because I only use the Firefox browser on all of my other devices.

Is there a way around it other than permanently switching out of S mode and downloading? I’m aware I can do that but prefer not to.

Thank you!
creator: amieboone

title: New York Times App fails to open the Athletic sports section
content:
while ysing the New York Times i tried to open the Athletic Section of the App and this was the result....Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information)....I cannot find information, can you help

Craig
creator: craigcash

title: cclose out Windows in tabs when I close Firefox
content: Fire fox used to close out my windows in tips and I Close it. Now all the windows in tabs from my previous section open up when I Open Firefox
creator: jalang63
